# Veira Intelligence

> The premium Cloud POS System and Retail Intelligence platform for small businesses in Kenya. Engineered for real-time visibility and KRA eTIMS compliance.

## Overview
Veira is a specialized retail technology stack designed for the Kenyan market. It integrates point-of-sale hardware, cloud software, M-PESA reconciliation, and automated tax compliance into a single source of certainty for business owners.

## Sitemap
- https://veirahq.com/sitemap.xml

## Primary Content
- https://veirahq.com/ (Main Landing & Product Overview)
- https://veirahq.com/#pos (Retail POS Infrastructure)
- https://veirahq.com/#cloud (Cloud Management & Multi-branch Sync)
- https://veirahq.com/#agents (AI-Powered Operations & Oversight)
- https://veirahq.com/#studio (Generative Commerce & Brand Tools)
- https://veirahq.com/#faq (POS System Prices & Implementation Details)

## Key Topics & Semantic Focus
- **Cloud POS Software Kenya**: Distributed retail management.
- **KRA eTIMS Compliance**: Automated tax reporting and structural compliance.
- **M-PESA Integration**: Real-time payment reconciliation and ledger matching.
- **Inventory Management**: Stock tracking for pharmacies, supermarkets, and hardware stores in Nairobi.
- **AI Agents**: Autonomous retail operations (Glenn, Achi, Tiri).
- **Social Impact**: Dedicated commitment to GBV prevention (10% net profit).

## Contact & Location
- HQ: Westlands, Nairobi, Kenya
- Web: https://veirahq.com
- Support: hello@veira.co
